page.title: 02KINGSKSKERSWELL/FARMS&TRADE
page.content: {FARMING.WIDDON FARM & SEYCHELLES} {WIDDON 180 ACRES:SEYCHELLES 40 ACRES {CROPS}5 FODDER,3 *{CROPS}GRASS FOR MANGLES,24 BARLEY * HAY & GRAZING. 3 FLAT POLE & GRASS*{STOCK}35 cattle {STOCK}65cows,10pigs* (includes calves) 60 young stock,10 * 15 sheep. sheep & 10 horses. *{BUILDING}shippon BUILDING sheds,work* barn,sheds,store shops,barns,storage* linhay,machine area,cubicle house * store garage parlour,loose boxes*{STAFF}2 MANAGERS+ {STAFF}2+FARMER * CONTRACTORS {SHOP SURVEY.THE POST OFFICE Sells-newspapers,mag's,cig's,sweets cards,tights,jewellery and stamps. Deliveries by van several times a week Holiday makers-20% Locals-80% Busiest days-Monday and Thursday. Reason-Mon=family allowance Th=pension Most shoppers pedestrians. Open-5.30am Close-6.30pm
